fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Site title

fields.name: path_prefix
fields.label: Base URL
fields.description: The base URL of this site. Useful for sites hosted under specific path, e.g.: https://www.example.com/my-site/

fields.name: domain
fields.label: Domain
fields.description: The domain of your site, including the protocol, e.g. https://mysite.com/

fields.name: favicon
fields.label: Favicon
fields.description: A square icon that represents your website

fields.name: layout_type
fields.label: Layout
fields.description: The layout of the site

fields.name: style
fields.label: Style
fields.description: The style of the site

fields.name: palette
fields.label: Palette
fields.description: The palette of the site

fields.name: mode
fields.label: Mode
fields.description: The color scheme of the site

fields.label: Site configuration File Path
fields.description: The file path of the file that stores this data

fields.name: stackbit_model_type

fields.name: title
fields.label: Header title
fields.description: The title displayed in the header if logo image not specified

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Logo
fields.description: The logo image displayed on the left side

fields.name: logo_alt
fields.label: Logo alt text
fields.description: The alt text of the logo image

fields.name: has_primary_nav
fields.label: Enable primary navigation menu
fields.description: Display the navigation menu on the left side, next to the site title/logo

fields.name: primary_nav_links
fields.label: Primary navigation menu links
fields.description: List of navigation links

fields.name: has_secondary_nav
fields.label: Enable secondary navigation menu
fields.description: Display the navigation menu on the right side

fields.name: secondary_nav_links
fields.label: Secondary navigation menu links
fields.description: List of navigation links

fields.name: has_anncmnt
fields.label: Enable announcement
fields.description: Display the announcement above the site header

fields.name: anncmnt_content
fields.label: Announcement content
fields.description: The text content of the announcement

fields.name: anncmnt_align
fields.label: Announcement horizontal alignment
fields.description: The horizontal alignment of the announcement content

fields.name: anncmnt_is_home_only
fields.label: Show on home page
fields.description: Display the announcement on the home page only.

fields.name: anncmnt_has_close
fields.label: Enable announcement close
fields.description: Display the announcement close button

fields.name: anncmnt_id
fields.label: Announcement ID
fields.description: A unique identifier, required if close button is enabled. Must be updated each time the announcement content changes

header.title: Marketing Playbook
header.anncmnt_content: Curabitur ac tellus mattis, tempor ipsum eu, eleifend sapien. **[Learn More](/pricing/)**

footer.content: © Stackbit. All rights reserved. This Jamstack site was created with Stackbit. Create yours now

sections.title: The Marketing Tricks No MBA Can Teach You
sections.subtitle: Your guide to B2B marketing in the real world.
sections.content:
This book is your go-to guide for all marketing channels. Learn how to
create effective landing pages, compelling ads, creative copywriting and
converting marketing materials for any business.

features.title: What’s Inside
features.subtitle: How this book will teach you real world marketing
features.content:
- All you need to know about PPC
- How to create a brand that sells
- Putting together a multi-channel marketing plan
- Tracking, attribution and analytics
- Analyzing your competitors
- Marketing ads no one can ignore
- The social media of today

features.title:
“This book is inspiring and practical. It’s thought-provoking and full
of examples which definitely motivates me”
features.subtitle: Hilary Ouse, Sr. Marketing Manager at Company

grid_items.content:
### Know Your Audience

Discovery, research and pure intuition: How to slice and dice all the
information you can gather about your customers.

### Performance Marketing

Know your PPC from your CPA and CTR — a quick start guide to performance marketing channels, setups, budgeting and creative.

### The Truth About Branding

A brand is merely a collection of touchpoints between your company and
your customers. Learn how to make those interactions count.

### Content is King

What you should be writing about, where it should be published, who
should read it, and what difference does it make. A comprehensive
guide to content marketing.

### Social Media

Google, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn — what should you use, and how? And how do you know that it's actually working? Build a social media strategy like a pro.

### Seeing What Works

There is no shortage of analytics tools for marketing campaigns —
email platforms, data centers, campaign dashboards and app
attribution... How to choose the right tools that will work for you.

features.title: Practical Exercises
features.subtitle: How you'll implement what you learn
features.content:
- Multi-channel marketing plan tutorials
- Brand questionnaire and worksheet
- Practice PPC campaigns
- 1hr consultation with a marketing guru
- Landing page templates
- Effective sales presentation starter

grid_items.content:
#### Marketers
 - Learn how all of the marketing pieces fit together
 - Master digital marketing for any business
 - Get access to marketing gurus and their tips
 - Prepare killer presentations and collateral

#### Designers
 - Gain big picture insights that affect design
 - Learn how your design can inspire action
 - Make advertisements that convert
 - Create digital assets for the right audience

#### Business owners
 - Kickstart your marketing plan and efforts
 - Upgrade your brand, website and social media
 - Prepare effective collateral for your business
 - Start advertising your company online

#### Product managers
 - Understand the context of your product work
 - Learn how to segment your audience properly
 - Implement brand voice and style in your work
 - Connect top of funnel activities with your flow

features.title: What’s Inside
features.subtitle: Brandon Guidelines, Marketing Guru
features.content:
**Marketing in the real world** is very different than what we learn
at school. If you've recently graduated and are making your first
steps in the business, it's imperative that you know how to use the
tools and tricks of the trade.


> **The world of marketing has changed dramatically in the last 10
years. Those who understand it, will succeed. But those who stay
behind, will have a lot to catch up on.”**


In this book I will teach you everything I know about B2B marketing.
From branding, marketing planning, content creation, SEO and PPC, to
segmenting your audience and understanding today's metrics and
analytics methodologies — this guide is the only marketing education
you'll ever need.

data.title: Story About the Book
data.content:
In the past, whenever a young man or woman wanted to be great at something, they would look to learn it from a master. This is how apprenticeships started, nowadays known as internships. Even when universities, colleges and educational institutions mushroomed all over the world, people still seek the guidance of a mentor to help them achieve their full potential and teach them tricks of the trade along the way.

## Digital Age Mentorship

![](/images/story.jpg)

Fast forward to the 2000s, and you'll find that less people are willing to dedicate their time to help young professionals grow, and fewer novices know to reach out and ask.

> Everything of value that I learned in my career, came from other people's stories and experience.”

This is why I decided to create a practical guide that would serve as an internship for those who want to excel in marketing. Instead of looking for a mentor, students and young marketers can read all the wealth of knowledge I acquired throught the years and digest it at their pace.

## Hands On Practice

There's nothing like trying things out for yourself.

In my book, you will find countless guides, tutorials, walk throughs, worksheets and collateral starters, to help you roll up your sleeves and apply your learnings. We even offer 1hr consultations by seasoned professionals, monthly webinars, and live Q&A sessions to help you hone in on the topics that are most relevant to your work.

Strong emphasis, aka bold, with **asterisks** or __underscores__. Combined emphasis with **asterisks and _underscores_**.
